sections.heading: official; liability.No custodial official shall be liable on his or her official bond as such custodial official for public money or public funds on deposit in a bank, capital stock financial institution, or qualifying mutual financial institution designated as a depository if the depository has fur
sections.text: official; liability.No custodial official shall be liable on his or her official bond as such custodial official for public money or public funds on deposit in a bank, capital stock financial institution, or qualifying mutual financial institution designated as a depository if the depository has furnished securities or provided a deposit guaranty bond, or any combination thereof, pursuant to the Public Funds Deposit Security Act.SourceLaws 1996, LB 1274, ยง 11;Laws 2001, LB 362, ยง 91;Laws 2019, LB622, ยง 7.
